title: Kubernetes and AI: Are They a Fit?
author: Alex Williams
description: At KubeCon Europe, we heard a lot about the current and future relationship of AI and Kubernetes, the orchestrator originally built to be stateless.
cntitle: Kubernetes 与人工智能：它们是否匹配？
cndescription: 在 KubeCon 欧洲，我们听说了很多关于 AI 和 Kubernetes 的当前和未来关系，Kubernetes 最初是构建为无状态的编排器。
